title: The Girl Who Spits Up Jewels (LN) - Novel Updates
genre: Fantasy   Romance   Slice of Life   Supernatural
author: Namiato   なみあと
description:
'Rear Fiat City is a medium-sized town located in the eastern part of the continent. In some corner of the town, there resides a small jewelry store.'

Here begins the tale of a girl who loves jewels.>
